main_thread.text: 1/ This is the first tweet in my thread about an interesting topic. Let me share some thoughts with you all.
2/ Here's the second part of my thread. As you can see, this is a continuation of my thoughts without any replies.
3/ And here's the third part. Notice how this thread only includes my main posts, not any replies from others or even my replies to them.
4/ Finally, here's my conclusion. Thanks for reading this thread!

learnings: The author is sharing a structured thread on a specific topic
The thread consists of four connected tweets that build upon each other
The author uses numbering to help readers follow the sequence
The content demonstrates how thread extraction works by showing only main posts
The thread format allows for longer-form content that exceeds single tweet limits
